text: Volodymyr Mykolayovych Troshkin (, ; 28 September 1947 – 5 July 2020) was a Soviet footballer and a Ukrainian coach. He was seen by many to be the best right back in Ukraine in the 1970s in Ukraine (Ukrainian SSR). He was born in Yenakiieve, then-Soviet Union. From 1972 to 1977, he played for the Soviet Union national football team. Troshkin died on 5 July 2020 at the age of 72.Volodymyr Troshkin is gone… (Не стало Володимира Трошкіна…). Ukrainian Premier League. 5 July 2020 ==Honours== * Soviet Top League winner: 1971, 1974, 1975, 1977 * Soviet Cup winner: 1974 * UEFA Cup Winners' Cup winner: 1974–75 * UEFA Super Cup winner: 1975 * European Football Championship runner- up: 1972 * Olympic bronze medal: 1976 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Soviet Union at UEFA Euro 1972
title: Volodymyr Troshkin
